targets.source: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(storage_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{bcs_cluster_id="$cluster_id", job="kubelet", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (instance, operation_name, volume_plugin, le))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_cgroup_manager_duration_seconds_bucket{bcs_cluster_id="$cluster_id", job="kubelet", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (instance, operation_type, le))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{bcs_cluster_id="$cluster_id",job="kubelet", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (instance, verb, url, le))
